project.name: XApi - Jre test code
project.description:
This module contains various test code that requires more dependencies to run than a given module needs to export.
Using one module exclusively for testing allows us to avoid any circular dependency issues in public api, plus it means we can build jars quickly, and worry about failing the build after and modules depending on us are already being processed on other threads. (mvn -T 2.5C = lots of threads)
